snippet: Opponents of the relocation of the Barnes Foundation and its world-renowned art collection from a Philadelphia suburb to a downtown museum quarter asked a Pennsylvania court on Monday to reopen the case allowing the relocation, citing a comment made...
abstract: Opponents of the relocation of the Barnes Foundation and its world-renowned art collection from a Philadelphia suburb to a downtown museum quarter asked a Pennsylvania court on Monday to reopen the case allowing the relocation, citing a comment made by the foundation's former director in a blog post.

headline.main: Former Head of Barnes Foundation Says Its Move Was Not Forced by Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Ex-Barnes Head Says It Wasn’t About Money
